## Events.CommentDrag class

Notifies listeners when a comment is being manually dragged/dropped.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CommentDrag extends UiBase 
```
**Extends:** [UiBase](./blockly.events_namespace.uibase_class.md)
